policies.inbound:
<set-variable name="requestIdHash" value="@{
            var requestId = context.RequestId.ToString();
            long hash = 0;
            
            // Using a different hashing algorithm for better distribution
            for (int i = 0; i < requestId.Length; i++) {
                hash = (hash * 17) + requestId[i];
            }
            
            // Ensure we get a positive number then mod 2
            return (Math.Abs(hash) % 2).ToString();
        }" />
        
        
            Request ID: @(context.RequestId) - Selected backend: @(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault<string>("requestIdHash"))
        
        
        
            <when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("requestIdHash") == "0")">
                
                
                
                    Selected backend 0: openai3-nmn6ie2ybaehk
                
            
            
                
                
                
                    Selected backend 1: aifoundry gpt-4o-mini-realtime-preview
